name: Reflector's Gimmicks
description:
♡

" Open your mind, Not your eyes.  For it can deceive you."
♡ 

 ❥A fun little Adventure game where the protagonist Arekusa along with her three friends Dumah, Itami, and Xanza wonder around the world of mystery! 

Who knows what silly situations they'd get theirselves into as they progress! Find out as you tag along the gang! Solve mini puzzles and Learn more about the world that surrounds you!

♡

( Hello! I am the game creator and I kind of want to say this is my very first game and  it may have its rough edges but hopefully enough to be entertaining! I'd really love if you can consider playing my game ! thank  you! Please this is just for fun I don't really have big goals about great making, nor plan on making money with it but all I wish is you enjoy the game!! ♡ )
